synopsis.text: The story follows the dedicated police officer, Riko Ikazuchi, and her partner, Keiji Noma, as they embark on an undercover mission to infiltrate a criminal organization hiding within an apartment complex. Posing as a pair of love-struck newlyweds, the duo faces unexpected challenges when their lack of nighttime noise raises suspicion among the criminals. To maintain their cover, they reluctantly resort to public displays of affection, blurring the lines between their professional duties and personal feelings. Amidst the complexities of their mission, Riko finds herself grappling with an unexpected mix of humiliation, pleasure, and a burgeoning attraction to her partner, all while staying committed to her pursuit of justice.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
